project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Build a simple text-based game where the player navigates through rooms, interacts with items, and faces challenges.

task.name: Set up the game structure with room navigation
Implement inventory management system to view picked items
Create simple challenges the player can encounter while navigating
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
